survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Electric Scooter Sharing Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric scooter sharing services to improve service quality, safety, and overall user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for mobile-friendly response.

script.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an electric scooter sharing service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with optional open text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an electric scooter sharing service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current pricing of the electric scooter sharing service?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents who use the service at least occasionally (Q1 not 'First time user').
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current pricing of the electric scooter sharing service?
script.routing_logic: All respondents who use the service at least occasionally (Q1 not 'First time user').

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a binary choice option. Follow up with an open-ended question if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: Please describe the safety concern you experienced.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended text box for detailed feedback. Ensure mobile responsiveness.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.
